TopicTitle: Kerbwide tour mission at Kapy Rock bug [recovery of craft reset the mission and took back the science given]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win11 | CPU: i7-12700K | GPU: RTX 3080 | RAM: 32GB

 

I completed the 2nd Kerbwide tour at Kapy Rock and collected the science for it. When I recovered the vessel used to complete mission after it reset the mission and took back the 400 science points. I completed the mission a second time and the mission reset again and took back the points. The mission remains incompleted.
